title: [Sylvarraend, Mistglin Wey]
description: A small but grandly appointed cottage stands directly opposite the trail, its walls clad in soft ivory-hued limestone.  Soft light emanates from each glaesine-paned window, giving off a welcoming glow appealing enough to any weary traveler.

A small but grandly appointed cottage stands directly opposite the trail, its walls clad in soft ivory-hued limestone.  Brightly painted shutters flank each glaesine-paned window, vying for the eye's attention with the colorful flowers planted in the beds surrounding the home.
